name: World of Sea Battle
storyline: Captain, welcome to the Archipelago lost in the ocean! Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the Age of Sail and the Golden Age of Piracy. Explore the vast game world and write your own story as you begin your journey on a simple sloop with a handful of gold in your pocket.
summary: World of Sea Battle is an action-packed MMO game in which players can take control of a ship and immerse themselves in the age of sail. With a huge open world and more than fifty ships of the XVI-XIX centuries, from small schooners to giant ships of the line, with various PvE and PvP game modes, as well as massive guild battles for control over the many ports of the archipelago.
